Translations.Text: vema nurihim min ayetin illa hiye ekberu min uhtiha. veehaznahum bil`azabi le`allehum yerci`un
vekalu ya eyyuhe-ssahiru-d`u lena rabbeke bima `ahide `indeke innena lemuhtedun
venada fir`avnu fi kavmihi kale ya kavmi eleyse li mulku misra vehazihi-l'enharu tecri min tahti. efela tubsirun
em ene hayrum min haze-llezi huve mehinuv vela yekadu yubin
felevla ulkiye `aleyhi esviratum min zehebin ev cae me`ahu-lmelaiketu mukterinin
festehaffe kavmehu feeta`uh. innehum kanu kavmen fasikin
velemma duribe-bnu meryeme meselen iza kavmuke minhu yesiddun
vekalu ealihetuna hayrun em hu. ma darabuhu leke illa cedela. bel hum kavmun hasimun
in huve illa `abdun en`amna `aleyhi vece`alnahu meselel libeni israil
velev nesau lece`alna minkum melaiketen fi-l'ardi yahlufun
